ISSUE.TITLE: Embed error - "Module 'redash.renderers' is not available"
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: While using the embed link , it was failing with the dependency error as below "Module 'redash.renderers' is not available" So as i quick fix I have commented out the line https://github.com/getredash/redash/blob/master/rd_ui/app/scripts/embed.js#L7 Now it works perfectly. Just wondering if anybody else is facing this issue.

BUGGYCOMMIT.MESSAGE: Merge pull request #852 from hudl/ConfigurationFixes Small fixes for new ConfigurationContainer use

COMMIT.MESSAGE: Fix #851: embed doesn't load due to missing module.
Merge pull request #853 from getredash/arikfr-patch-1 Fix #851: embed doesn't load due to missing module.
